comments: This is the foundational health care bill that people usually mean when they say Obamacare.
This is the bill that accompanied HR 3590, that passed through the Senate reconciliation procedure and was passed by the House along with HR 3590 in the same night.
An acronym people often use for the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act.
Acronym for the Protect IP Act
Acronym for the Stop Online Piracy Act
SOPA and PIPA are part of the same idea, and people may know one acronym and not the other.
SOPA and PIPA are part of the same idea, and people may know one acronym and not the other.
CISPA stands for Cyber Intelligence Sharing and Protection Act
Acronym for National Defense Authorization Act. Proposed each year, the bill for 2012 was peculiar as it included provisions for indefinite detention of Americans without trial.
The senate version of the National Defense Authorization Act.
The house version of the 2014 National Defense Authorization Act.
The senate version of the 2014 National Defense Authorization Act.
An early senate version of the 2014 National Defense Authorization Act. Superseded by S. 1197.
The bill that repealed Don't Ask Don't Tell in 2010.
Acronym for the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act
Acronym for title XIII of the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act, which is titled Health Information Technology for Economic and Clinical Health Act
Acronym for the Children's Online Privacy Protection Act
Acronym for the Gramm-Leach-Bliley Act, which repealed Glass-Steagall and de-regulated banking and insurance
Acronym for the Sarbanes-Oxley Act, which reformed corporate auditing and accounting
The American Taxpayer Relief Act of 2012, a/k/a the fiscal cliff bill
Acronym for division A of the Emergency Economic Stabilization Act of 2008, a/k/a the troubled asset relief program
identical to CISPA of the 112th Congress
Sec 735 of this bill is referred to coloquially as the “Monsanto Protection Act”
Sec 735 of this bill is referred to coloquially as the “Monsanto Protection Act”
Senate version of the omnibus bill dealing with the Department of Agriculture
House version of the omnibus bill dealing with the Department of Agriculture
Nutrition Reform and Work Opportunity Act of 2013 with cuts in the SNAP program
Employment Non-Discrimination Act of 2013
Employment Non-Discrimination Act of 2013
Uniting American Families Act of 2013
Uniting American Families Act of 2013
Reuniting Families Act
Nickname for the Consolidated and Further Continuing Appropriations Act of 2015
amends the program that allows DoD to transfer weapons and gear to federal and state agencies for law enforcement activities.

Acronym for 'Uniting and Strengthening America by Fulfilling Rights and Ending Eavesdropping Dragnet-collection and Online Monitoring Act' meant to halt mass data collection by the NSA and FBI. Failed in Nov 2014.
See "USA Freeedom Act"
The senate version of hr.3361 (USA Freedom Act / End Bulk Collection Act)
senate version of the keystone xl pipeline bill.
house version of the keystone xl pipeline bill.
Senate bill that proposes to invest settlement money from pharmaceutical companies into NIH grants.
Senate bill to invest $1 trillion into infrastructure projects across the country
